Text: 1.38 GiB .exe file ,, this smells like a donkeys bullshit from miles away? Or does it not ??
roligt på ett litet sätt seddar det undrar bara äftersom jag just har börjat tanka

Like the title says this a DEMO
You can d-load this directly from their site
http://www.ubi.com/UK/Games/Download.aspx?pId=4503&dcId=41

I got this demo from Gamespot.com it is a darn large file for sych a very VERY short demo. Still, it is pretty good. This game uses the Valve HL2 engine and so there is lots of neat object interaction in the game. It feels like a cross between HL2 and Oblivion. I am eagerly waiting for this sucker to be released. Highly recommend this demo.
